document.docTitle: Haplocheira barbimana subsp. robusta K. H. Barnard 1932
document.masterDocTitle: Amphipod crustaceans (Corophiidea and Gammaridea) associated with holdfasts of Macrocystis pyrifera from the Beagle Channel (Argentina) and additional records from the Southwestern Atlantic

Haplocheira barbimana robusta K.H. Barnard, 1932
, widely distributed in southern South America, is recorded for the first time off Bahía San Sebastián, Chubut and Río Negro provinces. Its association with holdfasts of
M. pyrifera
in the Beagle Channel is mentioned for the first time; K.H. Barnard (1932) reported this species inhabiting kelp roots in the Malvinas / Falkland Islands .
